title: RC Solar Tractor
detail: Rising gas prices? No time to stop to fill up? No worries! We've got the perfect solar-powered remedy for you!
extended_details: With the issues of climate change and agricultural destruction upon us today, impacting our home in ways such as the unimaginable burning of the Amazon Rainforest, we want to explore renewable energy sources to help the effort of sustainable agriculture. Our mini remote-controlled tractor is aimed at achieving this goal by acting as an EV to plant seeds and harvest crops.
